markdown:
| icon           = poe2 amulet_dyrwood_mayor icon.png
| description    = Edér chose not to return home to Gilded Vale. Still most comfortable living far from cities, he settled in Dyrford - which, like many towns in the Dyrwood, was beginning the slow process of rebuilding.

Believing now that it was the obligation of kith to be the leaders their gods had not been, Edér was soon named mayor of the town. Under his guidance, Dyrford began to prosper. He expelled the last of the Skaenites from the area and drew new settlers with the offer of land, a trick he had learned from someone he otherwise preferred to forget. With each passing day, Dyrford would come to more closely resemble the Gilded Vale of Edér's childhood - the one worthy of its name.

Upon his election, the local lord presented Edér with this medallion as a sign of official recognition and goodwill.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Neck
